channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: PepsiCo no longer sees profit growth in 2025 as tariffs lift supply-chain costs
item.description: PepsiCo’s stock falls after the company reports a rare quarterly earnings miss as tariffs raise costs, slow consumer spending.

item.title: ‘I survived a head-on car wreck’: I’m on Medicaid, but inheriting $290K. How do I protect it from the 5-year look-back rule?
item.description: “About 30 years ago, I survived a head-on car wreck. I was put on 100% disability. I have not worked since.”

item.title: Google adds more AI tools to its Workspace productivity apps

item.title: Former DeepSeeker and collaborators release new method for training reliable AI agents: RAGEN
item.description: RAGEN stands out not just as a technical contribution but as a conceptual step toward more autonomous, reasoning-capable AI agents.

item.title: From friction to flow: Why Swissport scrapped its VPN maze for Cato’s SASE fabric
item.description: Swissport ditches legacy tech, deploying a global, Zero Trust SASE architecture with Cato Networks securing 26,000 users, unlocking real-time control.
